channel.title: Flair on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in Flair on Some Title

item.title: Let me know by voice when an article you are interested in is posted
item.description: You can detect updates of blogs that you are interested in through RSS feeds, but sometimes you see the title and say, "Isn't it necessary to read it?" It’s a hassle to read the titles one by one, so I decided to ask Itako Tohoku of Voiceroid to read the article when I was interested in it. Extracting articles that may be of interest Classification of articles using Flair Flair is a library that can easily execute the latest natural language processing.
